title: Morocco - Tourist/Visit Visa

details.title: Required Documents
items: Valid passport(s) and minimum validity of the passport must be 6 months from the date of travel.
2 copies recent color photos sized 4/3 cm white background.
Bank statement of last 3 months and bank solvency certificate.
Marriage Certificate Notarized and English translated copy ( If Spouse name not mentioned in Passport).
An attestation of certified Invitation in case of family visit.
Specific documents for businessman or student.

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
